attributes.action: STOP THE CLOCKS GOING BACK! End Daylight Saving and Extend British Summer Time
attributes.additional_details:
Dear UK,

I propose and ask you to support my e-petition to maintain British Summer Time - all year round.

Do we really need to still have this unnecessary end to British Summer time? - Is Daylight saving really necessary?

Looking at the overall benefits of stopping the dark, miserable winter months in the UK, I believe this has to be seriously considered as a good option for everyone.

Safer Communities - Elderly, Children
Crime Reduction
More Productivity - All areas of life
Environmental Benefits
More Exercise
Happier People

If something is rational, reasonable, responsible and can be demonstrated to have a majority agreement then it should be so.

We get less good weather each year in the UK and I don't know a single person who doesn't look forward to the clocks going forward - but hates them going back.

Let's have a better year - ALL YEAR ROUND!
